# Configuration for module: zziplib

set( SOURCE_FILES
  zzip/dir.c
  zzip/err.c
  zzip/fetch.c
  zzip/file.c
  zzip/fseeko.c
  zzip/info.c
  zzip/memdisk.c
  zzip/mmapped.c
  zzip/plugin.c
  zzip/stat.c
  zzip/write.c
  zzip/zip.c
)

# Make sure the PLATFORM_HEADER_FILES variable is always defined
 set( PLATFORM_HEADER_FILES "" )

# Make sure the PLATFORM_SOURCE_FILES variable is always defined
 set( PLATFORM_SOURCE_FILES "" )

# For ease of use make a variable that has all files for this module
set( ALL_FILES ${HEADER_FILES} ${SOURCE_FILES} ${PLATFORM_HEADER_FILES} ${PLATFORM_SOURCE_FILES} )

set( MODULE_NAME "zziplib" )
add_library( ${MODULE_NAME} ${ALL_FILES} )
set_target_properties( ${MODULE_NAME} PROPERTIES COMPILE_DEFINITIONS "ZZIP_DLL;ZZIP_HAVE_STDINT_H" )

if ( ANDROID )
  target_link_libraries( ${MODULE_NAME} z )
  set_target_properties( ${MODULE_NAME} PROPERTIES COMPILE_DEFINITIONS "ZZIP_HAVE_STDINT_H" )
endif( ANDROID )

if ( LINUX )
  add_dependencies( ${MODULE_NAME} zlib )
  target_link_libraries( ${MODULE_NAME} zlib )
  set_target_properties( ${MODULE_NAME} PROPERTIES COMPILE_DEFINITIONS "ZZIP_HAVE_STDINT_H" )
endif( LINUX )

if ( WIN32 )
  add_dependencies( ${MODULE_NAME} zlib )
  target_link_libraries( ${MODULE_NAME} zlib )
endif( WIN32 )

if ( WIN64 )
  add_dependencies( ${MODULE_NAME} zlib )
  target_link_libraries( ${MODULE_NAME} zlib )
endif( WIN64 )

include_directories( ../zziplib zzip )

if ( LINUX )
  include_directories( ../zlib )
endif( LINUX )

if ( WIN32 )
  include_directories( ../zlib )
endif( WIN32 )

if ( WIN64 )
  include_directories( ../zlib )
endif( WIN64 )

GUCEF_config_lib( ${MODULE_NAME} )
